MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.CalendarActionResults Save() cil managed

Docs.summary: Saves the calendar response message in the Drafts folder. Calling this method results in a call to Exchange Web Services (EWS).
